definition: to wear/to put on/to dress/to bore through/to pierce/to perforate/to penetrate/to pass through/to thread

sentences.english: Tackling well and playing penetrating balls from midfield are vital.
sentences.chinese: 中場的搶斷和穿透性的出球是我們需要的。

sentences.english: Globe rupture can occur secondary to blunt or penetrating trauma.
sentences.chinese: 眼球破裂可繼發於鈍挫傷或穿透性損傷。

sentences.english: Signals in the spectrum can penetrate walls, making it ideal for wireless broadband.
sentences.chinese: 該頻段的信號可以穿透牆壁，從而非常適合無線寬帶。

sentences.english: Specifically, the clarity and projection of the altissimo range.
sentences.chinese: 具體地說，可以影響高音區發音的清晰度和穿透力嗎？

sentences.english: Tritium emits a weak form of radiation that does not travel very far in the air and cannot penetrate the skin.
sentences.chinese: 氚發出的輻射很弱，在空氣傳播不遠，不能穿透皮膚。

sentences.english: Its quantity of heat and the far-infrared can rapidly penetrate the skin points deep place.
sentences.chinese: 其熱量和遠紅外線能迅速穿透皮膚穴位深處。

sentences.english: Whatever she tries to launch at you isn't able to penetrate the protective force.
sentences.chinese: 不論她嘗試對你做什麼，也不能穿透這個保護的力量。

sentences.english: Last wax the incapability is over-weight and keep penetration beaded paint from peeping out ground colour.
sentences.chinese: 上蠟時不能過重，防止穿透油漆露出底色。

sentences.english: Several bullets struck the log-house, but not one entered;
sentences.chinese: 有幾發子彈打中了木屋子，但是沒有穿透進來。

sentences.english: Cripple's armor and magic penetration lowered to 10 from 25.
sentences.chinese: 殘廢的護甲與魔法穿透效果從25減少到10。

sentences.english: This forerunner of the musket is capable of firing deadly volleys that can pierce armour.
sentences.chinese: 這些火槍的先驅者可以射出穿透盔甲的致命齊射。

sentences.english: We shall need a strong light to penetrate through this mist.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須要用強光來穿透這層薄霧。

sentences.english: The penetration and deposition of the droplets increase with the gradient wind.
sentences.chinese: 而彌霧機械梯度風的存在，有利於霧滴的穿透和沉積。

sentences.english: This being looks at her with a hypnotically deep and steady gaze, as if penetrating her with its eyes.
sentences.chinese: 天使如催眠般深深凝望着她，彷彿要用目光將她穿透。

sentences.english: Easy, just see if my watch lasers can cut through the wall.
sentences.chinese: 簡單，看看我的表發出的激光能不能夠穿透那堵牆吧。

sentences.english: The missing becomes long-line, penetrates the thick raindrop, arrives at you.
sentences.chinese: 思念連成長線，穿透厚厚的雨點，來到你身邊。

definition: to penetrate/to pierce/to see clearly/to have an insight into
to wear out (clothes)/to pierce (a membrane etc)
to cut open/to rip/to streak across (lightning, meteor etc)/to pierce (scream, searchlight etc)
to transmit/transmission (of radiation through a medium)/passage
to cover/to hide from view/to obstruct or block/defilade (military)
to shine on/to light up/to irradiate
